metadata.title: CVE-2019-9895 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In PuTTY versions before 0.71 on Unix, a remotely triggerable buffer overflow exists in any kind of server-to-client forwarding.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9895` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pterm - 0.70-6
putty - 0.70-6
putty-tools - 0.70-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: putty package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.70-6').
